Need a creative web developer?

We're miles from each other.

SKILLS

SAUCY INTERACTIVE JAVASCRIPT

Don't waste too much of the working day playing with this..

I am a web developer.

I am a creative.

I am always learning.

I seek new opportunities.

I started University studying Fine Art at UWE Bristol but soon realised it was digital art I wanted to study. This prompted me to change courses, jumping into the second year of Digital Art & Technology (now referred to as Digital Media Design) at Plymouth University.
The curriculum consisted of a mixture of projects, all creative, but some with a larger amount of programming involved. Before I knew it, I was diving into web development, using my design skills to inform technical decisions and vice versa.
I graduated in 2019 with a First Class Honours, and after a year in my first industry role as a Front-End Developer at BillBuddy, I am now looking for new opportunities.
